text:
@toryboypierce @COVID19 @MattHancock You're clueless mate you need to start doing your homework. 
Never pulling up Maguire on his "assumptions." Last night on sky news why didn't you tell him Germany are counting based on Covid only deaths, or did you not know? 🤔
